title: S+ on ARURF, no mastery token?
body: Hello! Just got out of an ARURF game as Thresh, got an S+ but I didn't receive a mastery 7 token for it. Does ARURF not apply to the mastery system? Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Any mode outside of Normal or Ranked Summoner's Rift is not eligible for Mastery Tokens. This means ARAM, URF, and ARURF are will not grant them. Check out our [Champion Mastery FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for complete details on this system.

Let me know if you have any questions.

how come no1 is helping me with my bug report from 7 months ago, and i bumped it 3 months later, and still no response, you guys can answer questions like this but you really cant fix a bug that has been in the game for 2 years...champion mastery's hit pbe 2 years ago....2 years....and u guys let 10+ champions not display the mastery taunt right...heres a link to my post http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/lE9PZa0q-jannasoraka-more-4-7-mastery-taunt-bug-gameplay 

thanks
Ah, ok! Thanks for the reminder; I thought I remembered that they were eligible!
